Title: Spice Market - Deir Area Rug
Body (HTML):
You can make a visual and structural statement with our Karastan Spice Market Deir rug because this unique piece features an ornate, traditional look in jewel tones as well as an eco-friendly construction of post-consumer yarns.

  • The Spice Market collection boasts a soft feel, inherent durability, and ecofriendly construction for incredible versatility.
  • Add a striking statement piece to any bedroom, living room, or entryway with the timeless charm of this traditional piece, which features a balanced look of cool aquamarine and warm red tones.
  • Power-loomed of PET fibers that are made from recycled plastic bottles, this high-pile rug is both soft and resilient.
  • Professional rug cleaning is recommended for deep-set stains or difficult spills.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Haberdasher - Hand Tufted Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Strong visual textures bring dimension to the Haberdasher Hand Tufted area rug by Karastan. This design is made with practicality in mind, its versatile look and durable construction able to weather your most active interior placements.

  • Choose from several monochromatic colorways to best suit your interior decor theme, each one easy to coordinate.
  • A rich crosshatch design gives this contemporary rug the look of a woven fabric. Take advantage of its plush texture for quiet areas like bedrooms or let its strength shine in high-traffic spaces like entryways or living spaces.
  • Haberdasher collection rugs are hand-tufted for artisanal appeal. This blended rug is made with a combination of stain-resistant polyester and satisfying natural wool.
  • Rotate annually to ensure even wear. Vacuum weekly on a low power setting, avoiding the use of any type of brush roll or beater bar.

Title: Spice Market - Koyna Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Timeless designs and revolutionary fibers blend beautifully to create the unique look and feel of our Karastan Spice Market Koyna rug, which is inspired by ancient Persian designs but crafted from recycled plastic bottle fibers.

  • These soft rugs are consciously crafted of an exclusive Everstrand fiber, which is made of post-consumer content from plastic bottles.
  • Vintage-inspired and dotted with timeless floral motifs, this cream-hued foundation piece offers an inviting base for your master suite, entryway, or office.
  • A high pile of PET yarn is power-loomed by skilled artisans to create this durable indoor rug.
  • For spills, act quickly to absorb as much as the liquid as possible with a clean cloth before it sets.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Spice Market - Keralam Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Graceful and functional, our Karastan Spice Market Keralam rug combines a timeless Persian-inspired design with an eco-friendly construction. The result is a gorgeous statement piece that's soft, long-lasting, and easy to clean.

  • Highly resilient yet incredibly comfortable underfoot as well, the Spice Market collection is sure to be a favorite of yours for years to come.
  • Classic jewel tones and Persian-inspired botanical motifs add captivation and sophistication to this traditional piece, which add effortless grace to dining rooms, offices, and bedrooms.
  • These indoor area rugs are power-loomed of premium PET fibers in a high pile height.
  • Vacuum at least once a week to prolong the life of your rug and maintain healthy yarns.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Euphoria - Newbridge Area Rug
Body (HTML):
For the eco-conscious and style-savvy, there's no better floor covering than our Karastan Euphoria Newbridge rug. Crafted using renewable corn resources and featuring a classic look, it's sure to last a long time..

  • Less energy is utilized to craft this rug collection, making it an eco-friendly synthetic option that's also easy to clean and stain-resistant.
  • With a graceful design made to withstand the test of time, this traditional floor covering offers a sophisticated base for your dining room, foyer, or home office.
  • These power-loomed synthetic rugs boast a high pile height, incredible comfort, and remarkable durability.
  • Maintain a healthy, soft rug by vacuuming on top and beneath it once per week.

For the eco-conscious and style-savvy, there's no better floor covering than our Karastan Euphoria Newbridge rug. Crafted using renewable corn resources and featuring a classic look, it's sure to last a long time..

  • Less energy is utilized to craft this rug collection, making it an eco-friendly synthetic option that's also easy to clean and stain-resistant.
  • With a graceful design made to withstand the test of time, this traditional floor covering offers a sophisticated base for your dining room, foyer, or home office.
  • These power-loomed synthetic rugs boast a high pile height, incredible comfort, and remarkable durability.
  • Maintain a healthy, soft rug by vacuuming on top and beneath it once per week.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Spice Market - Saigon Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Irresistibly soft and remarkably durable, our Karastan Spice Market Saigon rug is crafted of eco-friendly yarns that are sourced from recycled plastic. Even better, this floor covering adds a playful, eye-catching bohemian accent.

  • The Spice Market collection boasts stain-resistance, comfort, and easy-care qualities thanks to its eco-conscious synthetic construction.
  • Add a captivating base to any living room, bedroom, or entryway with the deep jewel tones and bohemian style of this striking piece.
  • Expertly power-loomed by artisans, our bohemian floor covering comes in a high pile of PET yarns.
  • Avoid placing plants on top of your rug as spills and dirt can weaken rug fibers more quickly.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Spice Market - Levant Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by classic Moroccan designs and featuring vivid tones and stylish ogee motifs, our Karastan Spice Market Levant rug is sure to catch your eye. Its comfy-yet-resilient construction of eco-friendly fibers is just the cherry on top.

  • Crafted from recycled plastic bottle fibers, the Spice Market collection is stain-resistant and easy to clean.
  • Boasting striking ogee motifs in vibrant jewel tones, our Moroccan floor covering is the perfect statement piece for your living room, bedroom, or foyer.
  • This high-pile indoor rug features a power-loomed PET construction, resulting in comfort and durability.
  • To remove stubborn pet hairs, a combination of shaking, vacuuming, and brushing is recommended.

Title: Spice Market - Alcantara Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Eco-friendly quality and global beauty blend perfectly to create our Karastan Spice Market Alcantara rug, which is crafted of highly practical post-consumer fibers and boasts a handsome global look.

  • The Spice Market collection is crafted entirely of an exclusive Everstrand fiber, which is made of PET fibers from recycled plastic bottles.
  • Showcase global beauty in any living room, office, or dining area with the intricate bohemian look and jewel tones of this classic piece.
  • As practical as it is soft, this bohemian rug has a high pile of machine-loomed PET fibers.
  • Avoid deep staining by quickly blotting liquid spills with a clean, white cloth.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Spice Market - Musi Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Super soft, eco-friendly, and boasting timeless charm, our Karastan Spice Market Musi area rug pairs a premium poly construction with an elegant, bohemian look in balanced warm and cool tones.

  • Stain-resistant and incredibly durable, our eco-conscious floor covering is crafted of an exclusive fiber that's derived from recycled plastic.
  • Mediterranean-inspired hues and hundreds of classic floral motifs lend timeless appeal to this bohemian rug, which is the ideal foundation piece for your master suite, living room, or dining area.
  • Our bohemian area rug is power-loomed of a high pile of post-consumer fibers from recycled plastic bottles.
  • Trapped pet hairs should be removed by gently rubbing a brush over the surface of the rug.

  • Stain-resistant and incredibly durable, our eco-conscious floor covering is crafted of an exclusive fiber that's derived from recycled plastic.
  • Mediterranean-inspired hues and hundreds of classic floral motifs lend timeless appeal to this bohemian rug, which is the ideal foundation piece for your master suite, living room, or dining area.
  • Our bohemian area rug is power-loomed of a high pile of post-consumer fibers from recycled plastic bottles.
  • Trapped pet hairs should be removed by gently rubbing a brush over the surface of the rug.

Title: Euphoria - Monaghan Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Classic beauty meets revolutionary construction on our Karastan Euphoria Monaghan rug because this traditional piece boasts a unique makeup of soft, eco-conscious SmartStrand yarns that are crafted of corn resources using less energy..

  • Because this floor covering is crafted of eco-friendly synthetic materials, it's naturally stain-resistant, durable, and easy to clean.
  • An intricate design bursting with classic beauty covers this traditional, sandstone-toned piece, granting it effortless elegance that looks fantastic in casual or formal spaces.
  • Eco-friendly SmartStrand fibers are power-loomed into a plush pile, resulting in a durable indoor rug.
  • Rotate your rug every few months to evenly disperse wear and prolong its life.

Title: Elements - Calliope Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Create an exciting atmosphere in any living or dining space with the colorful, contemporary look of our Karastan Elements Calliope rug. This floor covering is also crafted of soft-yet-resilient yarns that are actually recycled for an eco-friendly touch..

  • Stain-resistant and easy to clean, the Elements collection is a family-friendly option that's crafted of soft, synthetic yarns.
  • Vibrant tones and a fun, contemporary design lend visual interest to any space in your home, from your master suite to your laundry room.
  • Our modern area rug is machine-loomed by artisans into a high pile of recycled PET fibers.
  • Avoid damage to rug fibers by vacuuming regularly on top and beneath.

Title: Euphoria - Rhodes Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Covered in ornate, Persian-inspired botanicals for must-have drama, our Karastan Euphoria Rhodes rug offers instant sophistication. Plus, it's crafted in an eco-conscious way of synthetic yarns for practicality and versatility..

  • Perfect for high-traffic areas, this rug's synthetic construction makes it stain-resistant, hard-wearing, and easy to maintain.
  • Neutral hues grant this traditional piece understated elegance, which plays nicely in entryways, offices, and dining rooms.
  • Power-loomed of synthetic yarns for performance and comfort, this high-pile indoor rug is sure to be a classic.
  • To avoid excess humidity and water spills, avoid putting plants on your area rug.

Title: Elements - Kasbar Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Decorate your favorite space with the timeless style of a classic Persian rug, reimagined in the sustainable modern materials of the Elements collection by Karastan. The beautiful Kasbar area rug features traditional motifs made to look vintage with distressed abrash coloration.

  • EverStrand is a yarn made from post-consumer recycled beverage bottles. This process transforms single-use plastics into soft yet sturdy fibers, woven into rugs that can provide years of enjoyment.
  • A bold center medallion makes this Persian area rug ideal for use as a strong focal point. Use to punctuate a furniture arrangement or center a room.
  • This polyester area rug is woven from short-cut EverStrand yarn for satisfying density. The low-profile pile makes it suitable for use where door clearance may be an issue.
  • Prevent stains by immediately blotting spills with a white cloth.
  • Made in the USA.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Titanium - Sans Pareil Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Express yourself through your interior design when you roll out this silky-soft Sans Pareil area rug from Karastan's Titanium collection..

  • The Titanium collection from Karastan is a quality line of area rugs made from viscose and wool for luxurious quality in today's homes.
  • A room with minimal sunlight, moisture, soil, and foot traffic exposure will protect this rug's natural pile from early signs of wear.
  • Add a pad to your purchase to place underneath your rug, preventing wear to the backing caused by sliding on hard floors.
  • Clean your rug regularly based on the care tag instructions and consider using a carpet sweeper to protect your rug's pile.

Title: Tempest - Quest Area Rug
Body (HTML): A perfect storm of New Zealand wool and SmartStrand, the rugs of the Tempest collection continue to embody Karastan Rugs' fashion legacy. Featuring vivid hues of midnight black, ruby red, and cobalt blue mixed with neutral greys and ivories, the patterns within this collection are the next step in color innovation. Together this marriage of fibers achieves a remarkable product that optimizes the quality of each: the sophisticated matte finish of the New Zealand wool is cleverly contrasted with the silky sheen of the SmartStrand Silk fiber.

Title: Euphoria - Ulster Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Fuss-free and eco-friendly, the Karastan Euphoria Ulster rug puts a new twist on traditional floor coverings. Thanks to its synthetic yarns crafted from renewable corn resources, this piece boasts a soft surface and impressive durability, too..

  • SmartStrand fibers grant this piece natural stain-resistance and durability, so it can thrive in high-traffic spaces.
  • Classic floral motifs and a timeless cream tone grant an inviting vibe to our traditional piece, whether you place it in your bedroom, family room, or office.
  • Power-loomed into a high pile of synthetic yarns, our stylish indoor rug is also soft and strong.
  • Area rugs can be scrubbed gently with a soft brush to remove stains.

Title: Estate - Highgrove Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Intricate detailing beckons the eye to explore the Highgrove area rug, a stunning Karastan design that makes classic elegance more accessible than ever before. This exquisite accent is part of the ultra-versatile Estate collection – a series of environmentally conscious area rugs designed to perform in the most active modern homes.

  • Highgrove is made from an innovative fiber called EverStrand, a soft and resilient material made from recycled post-consumer plastic water bottles.
  • A traditional rug pattern decorates the field in an all-over pattern, each element lightly layered and scalloped for a strong dimensional look. Versatile tans make this piece easy to coordinate while energetic splashes of color open the door for creative decorative pairings.
  • Estate is a series of smart synthetic area rugs made with a soft 100% EverStrand polyester pile. The pile is cropped short for easy upkeep, the edges tightly serged to prevent fraying in high-traffic spaces.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot away spills before they have a chance to set.

Title: Estate - Highgrove Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Intricate detailing beckons the eye to explore the Highgrove area rug, a stunning Karastan design that makes classic elegance more accessible than ever before. This exquisite accent is part of the ultra-versatile Estate collection – a series of environmentally conscious area rugs designed to perform in the most active modern homes.

  • Highgrove is made from an innovative fiber called EverStrand, a soft and resilient material made from recycled post-consumer plastic water bottles.
  • A traditional rug pattern decorates the field in an all-over pattern, each element lightly layered and scalloped for a strong dimensional look. Versatile tans make this piece easy to coordinate while energetic splashes of color open the door for creative decorative pairings.
  • Estate is a series of smart synthetic area rugs made with a soft 100% EverStrand polyester pile. The pile is cropped short for easy upkeep, the edges tightly serged to prevent fraying in high-traffic spaces.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot away spills before they have a chance to set.

Title: Soiree - Santorini Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Consciously crafted of recycled polyester yarns mixed with rayon, our Karastan Soiree Santorini has the durability and softness that you crave. Plus, its traditional design makes it a timeless classic.

  • Stain-resistant and easy to clean, our eco-friendly Soiree collection is perfect for families with pets or kids.
  • Traditional, Persian, and Southwestern elements combine to create this gorgeous piece in oyster, alabaster, and smoky gray tones, which can go anywhere in your home.
  • Recycled polyester and glistening rayon blend to make our medium-pile, power-loomed rug durable and still exceptionally soft.
  • Rotate your rug every couple of months to prolong its life and lessen foot traffic on the same areas.
  • Made in USA.

Title: Elements - Treviso Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Freeform and painterly, the Treviso area rug features bold striations and strokes of contrast much like the surface of well-worn stone. This style is part of the Elements collection by Karastan, a line of rugs woven with eco-friendly EverStrand yarn.

  • EverStrand is a soft yet durable fiber made from up to 100% post-consumer recycled plastics. With this innovative material, single-use plastics find lasting purpose as comfortable home accents.
  • Treviso is available in multiple colorways - choose from warm or cool tones to best suit your interior theme.
  • Polyester area rugs from the Elements collection are woven into a short-cut dense pile for easy maintenance and a plush satisfying feel underfoot.
  • Vacuum regularly. Blot spills with a white cloth.
  • Made in the USA.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Adalia - Tunceli Area Rug
Body (HTML): Influenced by antique Persian inspired styles, Karastan's Tunceli Area Rug in Cream offers an antique aesthetic. Ideal for elegant entryways, luxurious living rooms, beautiful bedrooms, opulent offices and more, the designs of the Adalia Collection are thoughtfully woven with a soft and stain-resistant blend of synthetic yarns. Imported from Turkey, each debut of this collection exudes international flair with a vintage fringed trim along the edges. Available in a spectrum of sizes, this area rug is beautiful as a set or solo.

Title: Estate - Gloucester Area Rug
Body (HTML): A modern interpretation of an antique Heriz inspired style, Karastan's Gloucester Area Rug is vibrant with a palette of indigo blue, purple, coral, green, beige and grey. This debut of the Estate Collection combines modern conscious construction techniques with the lavish design details synonymous with Karastan's legacy for timeless traditional styles. Ideal for elegant entryways, luxurious living rooms, beautiful bedrooms, opulent offices and more, the area rugs of this collection are woven with Karastan's exclusive eco-friendly EverStrand, a premium recycled synthetic yarn created from post-consumer plastic water bottles. Silky-soft to the touch, this sustainable style is also durably designed to be wear and stain resistant.

Title: Zephyr - Amphora Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Even bustling family homes can enjoy classic elegance with the Zephyr collection by Karastan. The beautiful Amphora area rug goes bold with antique Persian styling, rendered in thoughtful modern synthetics that can resist the wear and tear of everyday life.

  • Detailed vines and botanical motifs dance across the surface in a geometric rhythm, surrounded by layered borders on every side.
  • Use this traditional area rug in casual and formal placements alike. This durable design is perfect for demanding placements such as beneath the dining table or at the entryway, yet it is cozy enough for bedrooms and libraries as well.
  • Zephyr collection synthetic area rugs are made using stain-resistant SmartStrand Triexta, soft and dependable.
  • Blot away spills with a colorfast cloth. Vacuum only on a low-power setting without using a brush roll.

Title: Zephyr - Amphora Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Even bustling family homes can enjoy classic elegance with the Zephyr collection by Karastan. The beautiful Amphora area rug goes bold with antique Persian styling, rendered in thoughtful modern synthetics that can resist the wear and tear of everyday life.

  • Detailed vines and botanical motifs dance across the surface in a geometric rhythm, surrounded by layered borders on every side.
  • Use this traditional area rug in casual and formal placements alike. This durable design is perfect for demanding placements such as beneath the dining table or at the entryway, yet it is cozy enough for bedrooms and libraries as well.
  • Zephyr collection synthetic area rugs are made using stain-resistant SmartStrand Triexta, soft and dependable.
  • Blot away spills with a colorfast cloth. Vacuum only on a low-power setting without using a brush roll.

Title: Pandora - Covetous Area Rug
Body (HTML): Drawing inspiration from classic Persian designs, the Pandora Collection brings a global touch to contemporary and eclectic decor. This collection is finished with a space-dyed effect for a distinctive vintage look and is crafted from Karastan's exclusive triexta SmartStrand Silk yarn. The strength of SmartStrand, which features a built-in lifetime stain resistance, meets the sumptuous softness of silk in this premium quality rug.

Title: Traverse - Lanes Area Rug
Body (HTML): Designed for Karastan Rugs, the Traverse collection features a variety of intricate geometric and striped patterns with subtle abstract design accents in versatile neutral color combinations. Machine woven with premium polyester yarn; this area rug collection features a textured pile that makes a luxurious statement in any space. The resilient polyester offers sumptuous softness and rich colors with dependable durability designed to thrive in high traffic areas. Available in popular sizes such as 5x8 and 8x10, this area rug collection is a great choice for adding style to a variety of spaces in your home.

Title: Adalia - Kumra Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Each time you gaze at the Adalia Kumra Area Rug by Karastan, you'll find new details to admire.

  • This well-crafted area rug is manufactured in Turkey by machine.
  • The gorgeous, traditional area rug offers two distinct color palettes that are sure to take your breath away. Boasting intricate details, delicate fringe, and endless opulence, this area rug is a fine addition to any well-edited space.
  • This polypropylene and polyester area rug features stain-resistant, soft yarns for a cozy feel and easy clean-up.
  • Between professional cleanings, we recommend spot cleaning and vacuuming on low to keep your rug looking fresh and beautiful.

Title: Balboa - Alicante Area Rug
Body (HTML): The Balboa Area Rug Collection by Karastan Rugs is a perfect representation of tradition for any room in your home. Its detailed ornamental design infused with an artful sense of eclectic elegance infuses sophistication in any space within your home. Expertly hand knotted in India with 100% wool, this rug features natural soil and stain protection offering dependable durability in any high traffic living space.

Title: Zephyr - Chronos Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Anyone can enjoy the beauty of antique-inspired area rugs without the added upkeep or expense – the Zephyr collection by Karastan brings old world inspiration to the contemporary home. The stately Chronos area rug features a classic look with practical everyday dependability.

  • Each area rug in the Zephyr collection is resistant against staining and wear to keep up with even the most active family homes.
  • A central medallion is flanked by endlessly intricate botanical details that dance throughout the field, framed by a traditional rug border on every side. This versatile piece is suitable for casual and formal placements alike.
  • Chronos is a comfortable synthetic area rug with a short yet sumptuously soft pile, crafted from innovative SmartStrand Triexta for easy-care appeal.
  • Use a colorfast cloth to gently blot away spills before they soak through. Rotate annually.

Title: Elements - Mesmerize Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The whimsical Mesmerize area rug features an array of intricate patterns against a field of beige and light blue, like digital pixels played across the open sky. This piece is from the Elements collection by Karastan, a diverse series of rugs woven with sustainable EverStrand yarn.

  • EverStrand is a fiber made from recycled beverage bottles, allowing single-use plastics to find a lasting purpose as luxuriously soft area rugs that can be enjoyed every day.
  • Use this modern area rug to bring a splash of cheerful color to your interior. Because the design stretches from edge to edge with a subtle pattern, it offers versatile placement options beneath or between furniture arrangements.
  • Super-durable EverStrand yarn resists staining and fading, making this polyester area rug well-suited to spaces with heavier foot traffic.
  • Prolong the life of your rug by vacuuming regularly with the beater bar component disengaged.
  • Made in the USA.

Body (HTML):
The whimsical Mesmerize area rug features an array of intricate patterns against a field of beige and light blue, like digital pixels played across the open sky. This piece is from the Elements collection by Karastan, a diverse series of rugs woven with sustainable EverStrand yarn.

  • EverStrand is a fiber made from recycled beverage bottles, allowing single-use plastics to find a lasting purpose as luxuriously soft area rugs that can be enjoyed every day.
  • Use this modern area rug to bring a splash of cheerful color to your interior. Because the design stretches from edge to edge with a subtle pattern, it offers versatile placement options beneath or between furniture arrangements.
  • Super-durable EverStrand yarn resists staining and fading, making this polyester area rug well-suited to spaces with heavier foot traffic.
  • Prolong the life of your rug by vacuuming regularly with the beater bar component disengaged.
  • Made in the USA.

Title: Tempest - Echo Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Echo, echo, echo. Everything about our Karastan Tempest Echo rug is worth repeating, including how it's crafted of New Zealand wool and SmartStrand yarns, features a chic, modern look, and boasts a classic palette that allows untold versatility in its placement.

  • Easy to maintain and durable enough for high-traffic spaces, this gorgeous rug is a family-friendly favorite.
  • Featuring an abstract design of brushstrokes in natural cotton, will gray, and midnight tones, this contemporary floor covering offers a chic look that effortlessly complements global, traditional, and modern pieces.
  • Woven by machine for precision, this indoor rug features wool and SmartStrand fibers in a plush pile.
  • Vacuuming regularly on both sides will maintain the strength and prolong the life of this piece.
  • Made in USA.

Title: Elements - Suffuse Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Cool tones wash across the surface of the Suffuse area rug like an inspired watercolor canvas, textural striations lending a weathered look for timeworn appeal. Like other selections from the Elements collection by Karastan, this area rug integrates recycled materials for eco-friendly appeal.

  • Suffuse is woven from EverStrand yarn, a premium fiber made from up to 100% recycled plastic beverage bottles.
  • An earthy palette of greens, blues, and natural neutrals gives this abstract area rug a rich freeform look well-suited to a range of interior decor themes - modern, nautical, Bohemian chic, and beyond.
  • This polyester area rug features dense fibers cut into a short pile for excellent door clearance and easy everyday maintenance.
  • Keep your Suffuse area rug looking its best by vacuuming regularly. However, it is not recommended to use the vacuum beater bar on any area rug.
  • Made in the USA.

Title: Touchstone - Nore Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Elegance is evident in every aspect of our Karastan Touchstone Nore area rug, from the traditional beauty of its ornate floral motifs to the sumptuous feel of its silk-like synthetic yarns.

  • In addition to its comfy, silk-like texture, this collection is also really easy to clean and naturally stain-resistant.
  • Elevate the style in any space, from your bedroom to your living room, with the traditional floral designs on this piece bursting with timeless charm.
  • This high-pile indoor rug is masterfully power-loomed by artisans from soft-yet-resilient synthetic fibers.
  • Lighter stains or spills can be removed from rug fibers with the help of sponge and cold water.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Estate - Allerton Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by antique textiles but crafted using the latest modern materials, the beautiful Allerton area rug transcends era in the name of beauty and practicality. This exciting piece is part of the high-performance Estate collection by Karastan, a series that brings classic elegance to the most demanding placements throughout the home.

  • Estate collection rugs are made using Karastan's advanced EverStrand yarns, a durable yet super-soft fiber made from recycled plastic water bottles. This series offers high design with an eco-friendly twist.
  • Allerton features a playful traditional rug pattern, its open field adorned with a medley of colorful palmettes and rosette motifs. Botanical borders frame the composition. Every detail is lightly obscured with a weathered effect for a charming vintage look.
  • This practical synthetic rug is machine-made with a short 100% polyester rug pile that readily resists common sources of staining and wear. Feel confident using this family-friendly design in high traffic areas.
  • Quickly blot away spills with a dry white cloth before they have a chance to set. Rotate annually.

Title: Mystique Area Rug
Body (HTML): The exquisite Mystique Area Rug Collection by Karastan Rugs, inspired by Western Turkeys Oushak designs, features exuberantly optimistic accent colors with detailed Oushak abstract patterns. Expertly hand knotted in Pakistan with 100% wool, these area rugs feature natural soil and stain protection offering dependable durability in any high traffic living space.

Title: Tableau - Hand Loomed Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Satisfying texture defines the Tableau collection by Karastan. The striking Hand Loomed area rug features a substantial weave with thick yarns, loomed by hand using sumptuous wool for long-lasting comfort.

  • The surface cycles between different types of weaves, creating implied stripes that sweep from side to side.
  • Variegated yarns bring added richness and depth to this otherwise solid area rug. Draw from any of these undertones for exceptionally versatile coordination possibilities.
  • Each area rug in the Tableau collection is expertly handloomed. The dependable wool rug yarns are twisted with just a touch of viscose for a subtle luminous sheen.
  • Blot spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum weekly using a low power suction-only setting.

  • The surface cycles between different types of weaves, creating implied stripes that sweep from side to side.
  • Variegated yarns bring added richness and depth to this otherwise solid area rug. Draw from any of these undertones for exceptionally versatile coordination possibilities.
  • Each area rug in the Tableau collection is expertly handloomed. The dependable wool rug yarns are twisted with just a touch of viscose for a subtle luminous sheen.
  • Blot spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum weekly using a low power suction-only setting.

Title: Estate - Grasmere Area Rug
Body (HTML): Unmistakably influenced by vintage globally inspired tapestries, Karastan's Grasmere Area Rug offers heirloom-esque style in a vibrant overdyed palette of blue, coral, green, black, tan, beige and grey. This debut of the Estate Collection combines modern conscious construction techniques with the lavish design details synonymous with Karastan's legacy for timeless traditional styles. Ideal for elegant entryways, luxurious living rooms, beautiful bedrooms, opulent offices and more, the area rugs of this collection are woven with Karastan's exclusive eco-friendly EverStrand, a premium recycled synthetic yarn created from post-consumer plastic water bottles. Silky-soft to the touch, this sustainable style is also durably designed to be wear and stain resistant.

Title: Soiree - Gimlet Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With an earthy palette reminiscent of Tuscany, our Karastan Soiree Gimlet rug mixes an old-world vibe and fresh style and construction. This contemporary piece is sure to become a classic thanks to its environmentally-conscious makeup of recycled polyester yarns.

  • Thanks to its unique, eco-friendly construction, this collection is inherently stain-resistant and perfect for high-traffic areas.
  • Earthy tones of alabaster, oyster, and spice and a geometric design give this casual piece the ability to add a burst of energy to your living room, entryway, or dining room.
  • Woven by machine, this contemporary rug features a medium pile of recycled polyester.
  • Area rugs can be scrubbed gently with a soft brush to remove stains.
  • Made in USA.

Title: Cabrillo - Palencia Area Rug
Body (HTML):
History and design unite with the sophisticated Cabrillo Palencia Area Rug by Karastan.

  • Intricate medallion designs and fringe trim add a graceful and timeless aesthetic to this vintage area rug, while a soft, serene combination of earth tones and light blue add a hint of versatility to the opulent design.
  • This flat pile area rug is durable and stain-resistant, making it ideal for any high traffic area. The 100% wool area rug is as sophisticated as it is practical.
  • This lovely area rug is carefully hand-knotted in India.
  • This rug should be spot cleaned and vacuumed on low. Professional cleaning is recommended, and we advise against using a vacuum beater bar on this elegant rug.

Title: Solitude - Silk Road Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Create depth, dimension, and drama with the dynamic Solitude Silk Road Area Rug by Karastan.

  • With an abstract, painterly pattern in cream, dark gray, and blue, this traditional area rug combines modern and classic design styles for a totally transitional approach.
  • This viscose and polyester area rug is crafted from premium, durable yarns, making it a fine choice for any space. The ultra soft, low pile area rug offers a high/low cut for a textured look.
  • This gorgeous area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality in mind.
  • To keep your rug looking beautiful long-term, we recommend professional cleaning only.

Title: Elements - Envision Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Part of the Elements collection by Karastan, the beautiful Envision area rug makes an artistic statement with an eco-friendly twist. This style is woven from EverStrand yarn, a fiber derived from recycled plastic bottles expertly engineered to provide exceptional softness and strength.

  • This abstract area rug displays bold strokes of hazelnut and aquamarine, a dynamic layered look like oil on canvas. Use this durable piece to bring a decorative touch to even the most well-travelled places in your home - living rooms, dining rooms, grand entryways, and more.
  • EverStrand yarn grants a convenient level of stain resistance and colorfastness, the polyester rug fibers cut into a short pile for even easier maintenance.
  • Disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming. Blot spills immediately to reduce the chances of staining.
  • Made in the USA.

Title: Fowler - 91950 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The handsome Fowler area rug offers textural decorative appeal in a range of color options. Fowler is made with post-consumer recycled materials for eco-friendly appeal.

  • Karastan's premium EverStrand yarn is made with recycled plastic beverage bottles, transforming single-use objects into soft and stylish rugs that can be enjoyed for years to come.
  • Choose from a variety of color combinations. These contemporary area rugs are available with fields of black, indigo, and neutral beiges, each interwoven with bold accents ranging from garnet red to airy aqua and luxurious gold.
  • Short and dense pile makes this EverStrand polyester area rug especially simple to place and maintain.
  • Vacuum regularly with beater bar disengaged. Use a white cloth to immediately blot spills.
  • Made in the USA.

Title: Titanium - Tiberio Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Can't get enough of luxurious vintage decor? If so, we think you'll fall in love with this Tiberio area rug from Karastan's Titanium collection..

  • The Titanium collection from Karastan features transitional and traditional designs with a plush 1/2" pile made from viscose and wool.
  • Pick a room for your rug that receives minimal foot traffic, moisture, soil, and sunlight exposure to keep it in good condition for longer.
  • Placing a quality rug pad underneath your rug will prevent early wear caused by friction damage to the backing.
  • A carpet sweeper or a vacuum with the beater bar switched off will protect this rug's delicate natural pile from unnecessary damage.

  • Choose from a variety of color combinations. These contemporary area rugs are available with fields of black, indigo, and neutral beiges, each interwoven with bold accents ranging from garnet red to airy aqua and luxurious gold.
  • Short and dense pile makes this EverStrand polyester area rug especially simple to place and maintain.
  • Vacuum regularly with beater bar disengaged. Use a white cloth to immediately blot spills.
  • Made in the USA.

Title: Enigma - Spectral Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Featuring a simple, casual design that's as inviting as it is stylish, our Karastan Enigma Spectral rug is exceptionally versatile. Plus, it's crafted of synthetic and viscose fibers that feel extremely soft underfoot..

  • Exclusive triexta Smartstrand silk yarns and viscose combine to grant this rug a comfy feel and a slight shimmer.
  • Create a foundation in your living room, laundry room, or master suite that's humble yet chic with the casual design of our beautiful floor covering.
  • Our casual indoor rug boasts a high pile of power-loomed synthetic and viscose, resulting in a slight shimmer as well.
  • Keep your area rug healthy by regularly vacuuming it on either side after thoroughly shaking it outside.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Pandora - Wrath Area Rug
Body (HTML): Drawing inspiration from classic Persian designs, the Pandora Collection brings a global touch to contemporary and eclectic decor. Title: Zula - Mombasa Area Rug
Body (HTML): Experience the perfect blend of modern elegance and traditionally inspired style with Karastan Rugs' Zula Area Rug Collection. This collection boasts a variety of ornamental designs in a palette of rich hues, transforming your space into a masterpiece of eclectic sophistication and artful allure. Meticulously machine-woven using premium polyester yarn, the rugs offer plush softness, superior strength stain resistance, and enduring durability that thrives in high traffic areas. Available in scatters, runners, and popular sizes such as 5x8 and 8x10, this area rug is an excellent choice for adding style to a variety of spaces in your home.

Title: Kaleidoscope - Tatiana Area Rug
Body (HTML): An intricate ornamental floral pattern in a versatile color combination adorns the Kaleidoscope Tatiana Area Rug by Karastan Rugs bringing traditionally inspired style into any space. Machine tufted with premium SmartStrand Triexta synthetic yarn, this area rug offers an irresistible plush feel plus superior strength stain resistance and vivid color clarity that withstands everyday wear. Available in runners, 5x8, 8x10, and other popular sizes, this collection is a great choice for adding style to a variety of spaces in your home such as living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and more. This exquisite collection beautifully blends avant-garde aesthetics with Karastan Rug's legendary quality for a durable design that you can depend on in your everyday moments.

Title: Spice Market - Charlemont Area Rug
Body (HTML): An elegant Persian inspired design with ornamental elements, the style of Karastan Rugs' Charlemont Area Rug in Charcoal is rich with luxurious details influenced by ancient oriental artistry. Hues of charcoal and gold color the base, with neutral accents of sapphire and aquamarine. Finished in Karastan Rugs' exclusive EverStrand(TM) fiber, the Charlemont is consciously created from up to 100% post-consumer content derived from recycled plastic bottles. A premium polyester, EverStrand(TM) offers a thick, sumptuous softness, inherent stain resistance and vivid color clarity.

A premium polyester, EverStrand(TM) offers a thick, sumptuous softness, inherent stain resistance and vivid color clarity.

Title: Touchstone - Drava Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Crafted of synthetic yarns for performance, a soft feel, and luxe finish, our Karastan Touchstone Drava rug is capable of bringing the effortless elegance of its vintage-inspired design to a wide range of spaces.

  • Boasting an exclusive triexta Smartstrand silk yarn for a plush feel and inherent durability, this floor covering has the ability to go in high-traffic areas as well.
  • Whether you want a stylish base for you living room or timeless foundation in your master suite, the subtle paisley motifs and inviting tones of this vintage-inspired piece grant impressive versatility.
  • Machine-loomed of synthetic yarns, our high-pile indoor rug is both soft and hard-wearing.
  • For normal rug maintenance, vacuum on top then move the rug and continue vacuuming below it.

Title: Coventry - Kenilworth Area Rug
Body (HTML): The Coventry Area Rug Collection by Karastan Rugs adds a unique texture to any room. It features a vintage and intentionally irregular boucle look with its nubby texture and soft hued colors that complement a range of decor styles. Expertly hand knotted in India with 100% hand spun wool, these area rugs feature natural soil and stain protection offering dependable durability in any high traffic living space.

Title: Labyrinth - Hand Loomed Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The handsome Labyrinth Hand Loomed area rug delights with a sumptuous velvety-soft texture. The Labyrinth collection features a series of versatile go-to accents that offer endlessly flexible decorative possibilities.

  • Handcrafted construction imbues each Labyrinth collection area rug with undeniable artisanal appeal you can appreciate day after day.
  • Soft neutrals make this contemporary area rug especially simple to coordinate. Use this piece in the bedroom, in a quiet living space, or beneath a favorite reading chair anywhere in the home.
  • This is hand-loomed area rug made with an innovative combination of fibers. The luxurious viscose captures light for a luminous finish, while dependable wool ensures lasting durability.
  • Because of its viscose content, this area rug would perform its best in a dry placement. Use a dry white cloth or a clean sponge to blot away spills immediately.

Title: Balboa - Segovia Area Rug

Title: Zephyr - Acropolis Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Antique aesthetics are more practical and accessible than ever with the Zephyr collection from Karastan. The elegant Acropolis area rug features classic motifs you might find on a true vintage find, with its weathered look rendered in easy-care modern synthetics for active homes.

  • Zephyr collection area rugs boast built-in lifelong stain resistance for chic style that can withstand all of life’s demands.
  • Feel confident using this traditional area rug in parts of your home that experience the heaviest wear – use to underscore a formal dining arrangement, to greet guests at the entryway, or enjoy its soft sophistication in the living room.
  • Acropolis is an exacting machine-made design crafted from SmartStrand Triexta, a durable polyester-like fiber that offers the best of both comfort and strength.
  • Vacuum weekly using a low power setting without any type of brush roll or beater bar. Rotate annually to ensure even wear.

Title: Estate - Somersby Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Old-world aesthetics are made smart, accessible, and easy to enjoy with the sophisticated Estate collection by Karastan. The handsome Somersby area rug features classic Persian-inspired motifs rendered with a lightly distressed effect for warm vintage charm – made strong for modern performance in any setting.

  • Estate collection rugs are strong and eco-friendly. Each one is made with Karastan's exclusive EverStrand yarn, a soft and resilient material made from recycled plastic water bottles.
  • Somersby features a geometric center medallion flanked by stylized palmettes and layered borders on every side, its traditional rug composition softened by the timeworn striations of a vintage rug design.
  • The plush EverStrand polyester rug pile makes Somersby an especially family-friendly selection suitable for higher traffic spaces. The backing is finished with latex for stability and the edges are serged for added strength.
  • Prevent stains from setting by blotting spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Estate - Somersby Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Old-world aesthetics are made smart, accessible, and easy to enjoy with the sophisticated Estate collection by Karastan. The handsome Somersby area rug features classic Persian-inspired motifs rendered with a lightly distressed effect for warm vintage charm – made strong for modern performance in any setting.

  • Estate collection rugs are strong and eco-friendly. Each one is made with Karastan's exclusive EverStrand yarn, a soft and resilient material made from recycled plastic water bottles.
  • Somersby features a geometric center medallion flanked by stylized palmettes and layered borders on every side, its traditional rug composition softened by the timeworn striations of a vintage rug design.
  • The plush EverStrand polyester rug pile makes Somersby an especially family-friendly selection suitable for higher traffic spaces. The backing is finished with latex for stability and the edges are serged for added strength.
  • Prevent stains from setting by blotting spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Paradigm - Piedras Area Rug
Body (HTML): Powdery soft hues of light blue and creamy ivory perfectly paint the abstract striped inspired artistry of Karastan's Piedras Area Rug. Hand-knotted by skilled artisans with premium natural wool yarn, this debut of Karastan's Paradigm Collection showcases the legendary Persian influenced artistry Karastan is known for. Renowned for its strength, stain-resistance and softness, this rug's wool yarn offers the upmost in luxury and quality. Ideal for entryways, living rooms, kitchens, bedrooms, dining areas, offices and more, this style is also available in runners, 5' x 8' area rugs, large 8' x 10' area rugs and other popular sizes. Title: Tryst - Dorset Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Stay true to your classic, timeless interior design preferences with the lovely Tryst Dorset Area Rug by Karastan.

  • This high-quality area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • The gorgeous, traditional area rug boasts an opulent, oriental medallion design with undeniable global inspiration. Two color combination options ensure that this rug will coordinate perfectly with your well-edited space, whether you use it in your living room, bedroom, or office.
  • This acrylic and viscose area rug is stain-resistant, soft, and luxurious. The textured surface contributes beautifully to the overall charm of the carpet.
  • To keep your rug looking beautiful long-term, we recommend professional cleaning only.

Title: Kasbah - Safi Area Rug
Body (HTML): Designed for Karastan Rugs, the Kasbah collection features a variety of contemporary geometric inspired patterns with tribal and Southwestern design influences. Handwoven with premium 100% wool yarn; this area rug collection features a chunky textured pile that makes a bold statement in every room. The resilient wool offers sumptuous softness and rich colors with dependable durability designed to thrive in high traffic areas. Available in popular sizes such as 6x9 and 8x10, this area rug is a perfect choice for adding style to a variety of spaces in your home.

Title: Pandora - Enmity Area Rug
Body (HTML): Drawing inspiration from classic Persian designs, the Pandora Collection brings a global touch to contemporary and eclectic decor. This collection is finished with a space-dyed effect for a distinctive vintage look and is crafted from Karastan's exclusive triexta SmartStrand Silk yarn. The strength of SmartStrand, which features a built-in lifetime stain resistance, meets the sumptuous softness of silk in this premium quality rug.

Title: Tangier - Deviation Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Offering a smart contemporary take on the ever-popular Beni Ourain style, the Deviation area rug boasts a sense of understated luxury sure to elevate any interior theme. This piece is part of the expertly handmade Tangier collection by Karastan.

  • Versatile greyscale tones ensure the Deviation area rug can adapt to endless decor palettes, whether muted or vibrant.
  • A classic diamond pattern stretches across the surface in the style of contemporary Moroccan rugs, the lines gently wavering and broken in places for an especially expressive look.
  • Deviation is a blended area rug handloomed from a combination of shimmering viscose, durable polyester, and dependable comfortable wool.
  • Rugs with viscose content tend to perform best in dry conditions. Quickly blot away any spills with a dry white cloth.

Title: Zephyr - Bidjar Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Even the most active family homes can enjoy classic sophistication with the Zephyr collection by Karastan. Drawing inspiration from treasured antique textiles, the Bidjar area rug makes a high-end impression while remaining dependably practical and simple to maintain.

  • Bidjar sets a striking tone with its distinctive diamond-shaped central medallion, surrounded by a layered field that dances with botanical embellishments.
  • Feel confident using this traditional area rug even in your most demanding interior placements – beneath the dining table, in a high traffic entryway, or simply enjoy its cozy softness in a living space or bedroom.
  • Bidjar is crafted from innovative SmartStrand Triexta, a polyester-like synthetic rug fiber that resists stains and wear while providing exceptional comfort underfoot.
  • Gently blot away spills with a colorfast cloth before they soak through. Rotate your area rug at least once a year.

Title: Cabrillo - Girona Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Take a sumptuous journey through time via the impeccable Cabrillo Girona Area Rug by Karastan.

  • Against a backdrop of tranquil gray, this vintage area rug transports you to an era of refined opulence. Neutral, earth-toned details include intricate flourishes, captivating abstract medallions, and fringe trim.
  • This 100% wool area rug is as sophisticated as it is practical. The flat pile area rug is durable and stain-resistant, making it ideal for any high traffic area.
  • This carefully-crafted area rug is hand-knotted in India.
  • Spot cleaning and a low-powered vacuum will keep your rug looking beautiful and clean. Professional cleaning is recommended for any tough stains, or for a routine refresh.

Title: Solitude - Bellisima Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Take an artistic approach to refreshing your stylish interior with the eye-catching Solitude Bellisima Area Rug by Karastan.

  • Boasting a beige, cream, gray, and rust color scheme and an abstract, painterly design, this traditional area rug is as well-suited for modern spaces as it is for classic, sophisticated homes.
  • This viscose and polyester area rug is crafted from premium, durable yarns, making it a fine choice for any space. The ultra soft, low pile area rug offers a high/low cut for a textured look.
  • This chic, fine area rug is machine-made in Turkey with strict quality and durability standards in mind.
  • Remove dry staining and soiling with a vacuum, and schedule professional cleanings on a regular basis to keep your rug beautiful and clean.

  • This viscose and polyester area rug is crafted from premium, durable yarns, making it a fine choice for any space. The ultra soft, low pile area rug offers a high/low cut for a textured look.
  • This chic, fine area rug is machine-made in Turkey with strict quality and durability standards in mind.
  • Remove dry staining and soiling with a vacuum, and schedule professional cleanings on a regular basis to keep your rug beautiful and clean.

Title: Enigma - Continuum Area Rug
Body (HTML):
It may look like an aerial view of some distant planet, but our Karastan Enigma Continuum rug is actually a captivating modern floor covering that effortlessly blends with other styles in part because of its unique construction of velvet-like synthetic yarns..

  • Subtle shimmers from viscose and a velvety texture from an exclusive triexta Smartstrand silk yarn grant this piece exceptional comfort and good looks.
  • With an undulating modern pattern in tones of earth and sky, our eye-catching rug brings a nature-inspired aesthetic to your master suite, office, or powder room.
  • This modern rug is beautifully power-loomed into a high pile of synthetic and viscose fibers.
  • Weekly vacuuming will extend the life of your rug, preventing it from wearing out prematurely.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Kaleidoscope - Mele Area Rug
Body (HTML): Heirloom inspired details are featured in a warm color palette in the stately style of Karastan Rug's Mele Area Rug. Crafted through unique precision dye injected technology to create a tapestry of traditional design motifs, this debut of Karastan's Kaleidoscope Collection is thoughtfully worn through delicately distressed details and color erosion techniques. Stylized on a silky-soft canvas of SmartStrand Triexta yarn, this area rug offers a built-in lifetime stain and soil resistance that will never wear or wash off, helping to maintain its eternally elegant aesthetic. Ideal for entryways, living rooms, kitchens, bedrooms, dining areas, offices and more, this designer style is also available in runners, scatters, 5' x 8' area rugs, large 8' x 10' area rugs and other popular sizes. Keep your new rug and the flooring beneath looking their best with an essential all-surface, earth conscious rug pad, crafted of 100% recycled fibers and certified Green Label Plus by The Carpet & Rug Institute!

Title: Cabrillo - Cantabria Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Take a captivating voyage through the corridors of time with the elegant Cabrillo Cantabria Area Rug by Karastan.

  • This remarkable vintage area rug is a living work of art, graced with intricate details like enchanting flourishes and resplendent medallion designs. Boasting a regal silver backdrop, earth-toned details, and fringe trim, this rug effortlessly conjures an atmosphere of timeless elegance.
  • This 100% wool area rug is as sophisticated as it is practical. The flat pile area rug is durable and stain-resistant, making it ideal for any high traffic area.
  • Promising gorgeous, hand-knotted details, this stylish area rug is expertly crafted in India.
  • To keep your rug looking beautiful long-term, we recommend professional cleaning only.

Title: Echo - Grasole Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The global influence and vintage flair of the Echo Grasole Area Rug by Karastan are undeniable.

  • Boasting an earthy, sunset-inspired color scheme, floral medallions and other botanical elements, a washed finish, fringe trim, and an undeniable Southwestern vibe, this traditional area rug brings instant color and classic charm to any room.
  • This low pile area rug features a non-slip backing and careful, high-quality construction, making it a fine choice for any busy household. The durable, 100% polyester area rug is made with ultra soft, premium yarns for a cozy and inviting feel.
  • This effortlessly-chic, modern area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • Vacuum away dried soiling and staining, and arrange for professional cleanings on a regular basis to keep your rug looking clean and fresh.

Title: Kaleidoscope - Ayanda Area Rug
Body (HTML): The exquisite Kaleidoscope Ayanda Area Rug by Karastan Rugs features an ultra detailed multi-colored ornamental design that brings sophisticated style to any space. Machine tufted with premium SmartStrand Triexta synthetic yarn, this area rug offers an irresistible plush feel plus superior strength stain resistance and vivid color clarity that withstands everyday wear. Available in runners, 5x8, 8x10, and other popular sizes, this collection is a great choice for adding style to a variety of spaces in your home such as living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and more. This exquisite collection beautifully blends avant-garde aesthetics with Karastan Rug's legendary quality for a durable design that you can depend on in your everyday moments.

Title: Epiphany - Colorful Waves Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bring plush comfort and rich color to your favorite interior placement with the Colorful Waves area rug by Karastan. This piece is part of the performance-focused Epiphany collection, a series made to keep up with demanding placements like entryways and bustling living rooms.

  • Each area rug in the Epiphany collection is made using advanced SmartStrand synthetics with built-in resistance against common sources of staining and wear. Feel confident using this collection in vibrant family homes.
  • This contemporary rug features layered striations of steely robin's egg blue, warm browns, and casual taupe – a relaxing palette with endless coordination possibilities.
  • Epiphany collection rugs are machine-made using durable polyester rug yarns, the pile cropped low for easier everyday upkeep and care. All edges are tightly serged to resist fraying.
  • Blot spills immediately upon noticing using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting or a hard surface attachment.

Title: Divina - Virtuous Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Soften your sophisticated space with the dynamic Divina Virtuous Area Rug by Karastan.

  • Amidst a rich tapestry of colors that includes cream, light blue, khaki, and gray, this traditional area rug rug seamlessly balances the past and the present. Each medallion, elegant and highly detailed, exudes an aura of enduring sophistication and timeless grandeur, while lovely fringe trim adds even more character and contrast.
  • With its high/low pile, this flat pile area rug showcases a remarkable contrast and a polished sheen that creates a truly enchanting visual appeal. The luxe, 100% polyester area rug exudes opulence and elegance.
  • This stylish area rug promises quality and durability, and it is machine-made in Turkey.
  • For product longevity, we recommend avoiding the use of a vacuum beater bar on your rug.

Title: Kaleidoscope - Mozambique Area Rug
Body (HTML): Inspired by Southwestern art, the Kaleidoscope Mozambique Area Rug by Karastan Rugs brings bold style into any space with its oversize medallion design in rich colors. Machine tufted with premium SmartStrand Triexta synthetic yarn, this area rug offers an irresistible plush feel plus superior strength stain resistance and vivid color clarity that withstands everyday wear. Available in runners, 5x8, 8x10, and other popular sizes, this collection is a great choice for adding style to a variety of spaces in your home such as living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and more. This exquisite collection beautifully blends avant-garde aesthetics with Karastan Rug's legendary quality for a durable design that you can depend on in your everyday moments.

Title: Enigma - Aura Area Rug
Body (HTML):
We married a warm, versatile look with the glamour and comfort of exclusive synthetic yarns, resulting in our Karastan Enigma Aura rug. No matter where you feature it, comfort and style will follow..

  • Exclusive triexta Smartstrand yarns as well as shiny viscose lend a velvety feel and shimmering look to this unique collection.
  • Warm, earthy tones and a simple, transitional design grant this chic piece incredible versatility, so it can complement a traditional bedroom just as easily as a modern home office.
  • Featuring a high pile of synthetic and viscose yarns, our power-loomed rug is both soft and shiny.
  • Remove embedded pet hairs and debris by gently brushing or sweeping your rug every few weeks.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

  • Exclusive triexta Smartstrand yarns as well as shiny viscose lend a velvety feel and shimmering look to this unique collection.
  • Warm, earthy tones and a simple, transitional design grant this chic piece incredible versatility, so it can complement a traditional bedroom just as easily as a modern home office.
  • Featuring a high pile of synthetic and viscose yarns, our power-loomed rug is both soft and shiny.
  • Remove embedded pet hairs and debris by gently brushing or sweeping your rug every few weeks.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Touchstone - Debonair Area Rug
Body (HTML):
So versatile that it can thrive in casual or traditional settings, our Karastan Touchstone Debonair rug features inviting hues and a transitional design. Plus, it's incredibly plush yet high durable courtesy of its synthetic makeup.

  • Fade and stain-resistant as well as easy to clean, this resilient rug collection boasts a long-lasting synthetic construction.
  • Thanks to its transitional design and inviting palette of white, jadeite, and gray tones, this versatile piece easily suits classic or contemporary spaces.
  • This sumptuous area rug features a power-loomed construction of durable synthetic yarns in a high pile.
  • Scrub softly with a brush to pick up pet hairs that may be difficult to remove.

Title: Milestones - Logan Area Rug
Body (HTML): Creative and contemporary, the Milestone Collection brings intriguingly modern and invitingly livable style to any room with its abstract designs and neutral grey, beige, and tan color palette combinations. Crafted of sumptuously soft polyester, this silky yarn also offers dependable durability and illustrious color clarity that is designed to thrive in high traffic spaces around your home.
